name: Pub Simulator (itch)
description:
Manage a pub, serve drinks and please the costumers. Try to earn as much money as possible and keep the popularity up. Don't forget to wash the dishes.

And... try not to break all the glasses.

(This game was created for the Mini Jam 97)

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - Interact with objects

Developers:

Zactar Zero - https://zactarzero.itch.io/

The Scarecrow - https://itch.io/profile/the-scarecrow/

Assets used:

POLYGON City - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/polygon-city-low-pol...

Wine Glass Shattering A4 Sound Effect - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/glass-shatte...

Ringing bell - happy.wav - https://freesound.org/people/domrodrig/sounds/116779/
